list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a machine or device for drying something, especially the hair or laundry.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: putting their sweaters in the big dryer
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đưa áo len của họ vào máy sấy lớn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a substance mixed with oil paint or ink to promote drying.
